0: We used the pool and hot tub nightly after spending the day at the vineyards before heading off walking to incredible dinners in Yountvile
Delicious breakfast and excellent pool area
The pool area is great for chilling and Fridays complimentary wine tasting made our afternoon
The Vintage will benefit from a revamped lobby lounge area and pool area
We also enjoyed the pool in the afternoon
Amenities such as the pool included breakfast and fitness center also added a lot of value to our stay
Friendly and very helpful staff along with a delicious breakfast in the beautiful garden pool lobby area
We enjoyed the little patio off of our room and the pool was pretty and relaxing
1: We were given a king room on the second floor of one of the buildings closest to the main lobby building overlooking the pool Room 805
I am sure the new lobby and pool construction will be great and enhance the whole Vintage Inn experience however we were surprised renovation was not mentioned when we booked the room
Relax by the hot tub pool for a few hours before dinner then walk to town
The website states that the Vintage Inn has a pool
Pools are usually renovated when not needed
We were told we could use the pool at the vilagio a sister hotel since theirs was out of order
The rooms are charming as always but we were not told when booking that the entire lobby and pool were under construction
Parking is ample and yes there is construction around the pool area but it did not hamper our stay one bit
There are two pools available to use
it is a 4block walk to this pool
2: Although the hotel is undergoing construction which makes the lobby difficult to find and prevents guests from using the pool or hot tub the rooms are still huge and have great amenities massive flat screen TVs fireplaces jacuzi hot tubs porches etc
Unfortunately it was a very cold few days when we were there so we could not take advantage of the lovely outdoor areas and pool which looked very inviting
bar by the pool and at breakfast Called to request a look in the room for an item I left behind
And the pool and hot tub is even open for 24 hours
Second it took an extremely long time to get drinks at the pool during the day as pool attendants were not walking around unles guests went and asked the front desk to send someone

Although there were no cushions on the furniture around the pool making it essentially unusable this might have been due to the time of year but the surroundings are so beautiful that even in cooler temperatures it would have been nice to sit around the pool
Upon returning to our room from the pool area we found our key did not work because we were now past the normal checkout time
Only one thing that we did not like is that the outside area must be clean better like fireplace swimming pool outside sofas
If I had more time I would had swam laps in the pool
Would not recommend Room 80 for sleeping noisy inside refrigerator rumbling and ice machine right outside this room and polside location with fire pit makes for potentially raucous late evenings
